thread.title: Lee Pickersgill

author: Lee Pickersgill
title: Lee Pickersgill
text:
Wanted some roof bars for my car and had a nightmare with Halfords.
Used MicksGarage and got a great set of roof bars for a great price (Â£45 cheaper than what I spent at Halfords), the delivery was free and quick.
Will definitely be using MicksGarage in the future.
Special thanks to Louise and Mickey at the customer care team for helping me out.
